snippet: The graduate school will use the money for the first academic building on its Roosevelt Island campus, which is set to open in 2017.
abstract: Bloomberg Philanthropies gives $100 million to Cornell Tech, applied sciences graduate school of Cornell University, to construct technical school on Roosevelt Island; building, to be called Bloomberg Center, is scheduled to open in 2017.
lead_paragraph: The graduate school will use the money for the first academic building on its Roosevelt Island campus, which is set to open in 2017.

headline.main: Bloomberg Philanthropies Gives $100 Million to Cornell Tech
headline.print_headline: Cornell Tech Gets Millions for Campus
